about_the_game:
Panacle: Back to the Wild is a indie card game developed by one person. The game not only combines the best of War Chess, roguelike, Building Deck, but also has an original "Tactical Position" game mechanic, and a series of characters and cards designed with the "Tactical Position" mechanic as the core. In terms of worldview and story, I will try to create a different kind of hardcore sci-fi future world for you, maybe it's not that exciting, but maybe it will make you unheard of and refreshing.
In the Demo version you can.
1. Experience the complete combat system

2. Collect and use some characters
3. Collect and use some cards
4. Collect and use some tactical positions

5. Experience part of the Story Mode gameplay
6. Experience part of the Adventure Mode gameplay

7. Experience part of the Training Mode gameplay
The content of the demo version will not be continuously updated, but we will update the bug fixes and special effects related to the content already included in the demo version.
If you are satisfied with the demo version, we are looking forward to your purchase of the ea version/release, and we will continue to update the content of the ea version/release to bring you a better game experience.
We wish you a happy game!
detailed_description:
Panacle: Back to the Wild is a indie card game developed by one person. The game not only combines the best of War Chess, roguelike, Building Deck, but also has an original "Tactical Position" game mechanic, and a series of characters and cards designed with the "Tactical Position" mechanic as the core. In terms of worldview and story, I will try to create a different kind of hardcore sci-fi future world for you, maybe it's not that exciting, but maybe it will make you unheard of and refreshing.
In the Demo version you can.
1. Experience the complete combat system

2. Collect and use some characters
3. Collect and use some cards
4. Collect and use some tactical positions

5. Experience part of the Story Mode gameplay
6. Experience part of the Adventure Mode gameplay

7. Experience part of the Training Mode gameplay
The content of the demo version will not be continuously updated, but we will update the bug fixes and special effects related to the content already included in the demo version.
If you are satisfied with the demo version, we are looking forward to your purchase of the ea version/release, and we will continue to update the content of the ea version/release to bring you a better game experience.
We wish you a happy game!
name: 灵子：重返荒野 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A CCG integrating warchess, roguelike, deck building with a world outlook of the post civilization era
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
